EmailTemplate.name: 180829 Member Success Stories Outreach
EmailTemplate.subject: Livongo’s positive impact on members’ health and quality of life
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I am excited to share that we recently launched a new page on our website that highlights our member success stories at Livongo. Here is a link.
As you know, we are passionate about empowering our members to live better and healthier lives, and these success stories help to showcase the positive impact we make on a daily basis. Over time, we will share member and client stories from our diabetes, hypertension and prediabetes program.
We hope these stories inspire you and look forward to connecting soon.
Thanks,
[Signature]
